verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: wo] n't take responsibility for the consequences of an immigration policy that is separating children from parents who are arrested for illegally crossing the U.S .- Mexico border . He persists in blaming a " Democrat " law for driving families apart , though no such law exists . In remarks to reporters and in an interview with Fox News , he held firm to a contention he 's made , falsely and for weeks , holding Democrats responsible for splitting ...
